import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import "./singlePost.css" import { useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" export default function SinglePost() { const location =useLocation() const path=location.pathname.split("/")[2] useEffect(()=>{ const getPost=async()=>{ console.log('/post'+path) }; getPost(); },[path]) return (
